post:
**MicroNodes VPS Hosting**
  
  Why choose us?
  
  We are a company founded in 2016 to provide affordable and high quality KVM VPS's. We have spent many years buying hosting ourselves and know what kind of a host a customer wants. We sell unmanaged Premium Dedicated Server VPS’s, but we provide as much support as we can. Upon request, we can assist our customers in setting up gameservers on their VPS’s. Our VPS’s support a wide range of Operating Systems such as Ubuntu, Debian, CentOS, & even Windows Server (Unlicensed - Bring Your Own License). Our goal is to provide fast, secure, and high quality VPS's at an affordable rate. We utilize Wowrack's Datacenter to host our nodes in Seattle, Washington. We have grown to now provide premium service. We are your affordable and sustainable hosting solution.
  
  **Website: https://micronodes.net**
 
  **100 MB Test File: https://micronodes.net/testfile/100MB.zip**
 
  **Test IP:** 104.192.101.3
  
  
  **Node Specs:**
  
  •Dual Intel Xeon L5640s (6 cores/12 threads each CPU)>
 
  •64GB DDR3 ECC RAM
 
  •4x 1TB RAID 10 Array of Premium Western Digital/Hitachi HDDs
 
  •10Gbps Fiber Uplink
  
  All VPS's come with 20Gbps DDoS Protection with an L7 filter to keep your server safe and online.
 
  **Plans and Pricing:
  Use promo code LET25 for 25% off recurring OR use promo code LET35ONETIME for 35% off your first month!**
  
  **• 512MB RAM**
  
  -1024MB Swap
  
  -1x vCPU
  
  -20GB HDD space
  
  -500GB transfer
  
  -10Gbps Fiber uplink
  
  -1x IPv4
  
  -KVM/Virtualizer
  
  -$3.75/Month with promo code LET25
  
  -$3.24 for your first month with promo code LET35ONETIME
  
  -Order link (http://micronodes.net/whmcs/cart.php?a=add&pid=3)
  
  **• 1024MB RAM**
  
  -1024MB Swap
  
  -2x vCPU
  
  -50GB HDD space
  
  -1.5TB transfer
  
  -10Gbps uplink
  
  -1x IPv4
  
  -KVM/Virtualizer
  
  -$6.75/Month with promo code LET25
  
  Order link (http://micronodes.net/whmcs/cart.php?a=add&pid=2)
  
  Each additional IPV4 is $2.50/IP. To purchase an additional IPV4, please go to Services - View Available Addons - Additional IPV4.
  
  
  All plans include TCP DDoS protection @ 20Gbps
  
  For any questions or modifications to plans needed contact billing@micronodes.net or reply to this thread.
